summary: Superfecund twins Louis and Lucien, who can feel pain from each other's injuries, revolt against a tyrannical regent who holds France under his iron fist.
cast: Cheech Marin|Tommy Chong|Roy Dotrice|Shelby Chong|Rikki Marin|Edie McClurg|Robbi Chong|Rae Dawn Chong|Kay Dotrice|Jennie C. Kos|Martin Pepper|Yvan Chiffre|Dan Schwarz|Jean-Claude Dreyfus|Serge Fedoroff|Bernard Szabo|David Gabison|Leslie Rain|Claude Aufaure|Dominique de Goege|Johns Rajohnson|Michael Dahan|Joel Dobart|Anna Gaylor|Jacques Canselier|Gilles Tamiz|Olivier Achard|Claude Meyer|Marc Andréoni|Christel Chouchane|Marie-Christine Robert|Marina DeFosse|Elizabeth Grosz|Rebecca Potok|Claire Magnin|André Penvern|Pierre Olaf|André Chaumeau|Famille Lopez|Guila Salama|Roxane Nouban|Sophie Favier|Muriel Dubrule|Alex Pandev|Georgette Anys|Josine Comellas|Germaine Delbat|Laurie Main|Albert Simono|François Rimbau
title: El destete de los hermanos corsos
